Sentencas: Heterostructured composite ceria electrolytes have been shown to accelerate the oxygen reduction activity and provide a new approach to improve solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, barium carbonate was added to gadolinium-doped ceria, Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (GDC) electrolyte to improve the electrochemical performance of intermediate-temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The heterostructured electrolyte was formed by the addition of 5 wt % BaCO3 to a GDC electrolyte, resulting in a reaction during sintering that formed well-dispersed BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3-delta (BCG) throughout the electrolyte.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The resulting material was tested as an electrolyte using La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta as a cathode, resulting in a dramatic reduction to the polarization resistance of more than half the value (600 and 700 degrees C, the resistance was reduced from 2.49 and 0.23 Omega cm(2) to 1.21 and 0.12 Omega cm(2)) obtained by using pure GDC as an electrolyte.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, full cell SOFC tests employing the heterostructured electrolyte conducted during overextended durations indicated that the BCG phase in the 5BCGGDC electrolyte was stable in an air atmosphere with no observed reactions with residual CO2.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This approach of tailoring surface reactivity by tailoring the composition and structure of the electrolyte as opposed to electrode materials provides an alternative method to improve fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Enhanced Oxygen Electrocatalysis in Heterostructured Ceria Electrolytes for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
